page.title: 09HOGNASTON VILLAGE HALL
page.content: When you enter the building through the main entrance you enter a square lobby with toilet rooms off to one side and the main hall on the other. The hall itself measures 50 feet by 22 feet.It can be separated into two sections by full length curtains which have just been fitted.There is a kitchen attached. The hall is licensed for up to one hundred people.It is used regularly by various groups of people. It is used for parties,wedding receptions,meetings of the Womens Institute,and The Mothers Union as well as for educational classes.When we went,there was a small adult art class. Afternoon teas are served at Bank Holidays to help towards the running costs.There is always a Harvest Supper during October.
